name: Mitigation Playbook for Command Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed PowerShell commands to extract sensitive data. It implements actions for terminating malicious processes, isolating affected hosts, scanning for malware, reviewing logs, and changing passwords for compromised accounts.

parallel--0ac3b32a-6fef-4664-ad85-4f0c1e.name: Execute Mitigation Actions
parallel--0ac3b32a-6fef-4664-ad85-4f0c1e.description: Execute actions in parallel to mitigate the incident.

action--b1c0a877-7749-4c0c-b0d7-17e075b3.name: Kill Malicious Process
action--b1c0a877-7749-4c0c-b0d7-17e075b3.description: Terminate the process associated with the detected malicious PowerShell command.

action--dde01841-d77b-4306-81be-41ba8d6e.name: Isolate Affected Host
action--dde01841-d77b-4306-81be-41ba8d6e.description: Isolate the host where the malicious activity was detected.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) == 'host-22' ]; then echo 'Isolating...' && iptables -A INPUT -s 192.168.1.10 -j DROP; fi

action--a246b3a1-434b-49fa-86f3-67dc6b9f.name: Scan System for Malware
action--a246b3a1-434b-49fa-86f3-67dc6b9f.description: Perform a malware scan and repeat until the system is clean.

action--f3f75ad7-5a51-4cfa-bbc2-36d7fb96.name: Review User Access Logs
action--f3f75ad7-5a51-4cfa-bbc2-36d7fb96.description: Check user access logs for signs of suspicious activity.

action--39ec0619-e5c9-47e7-b18d-92c9a6c4.name: Change Passwords for Compromised Accounts
action--39ec0619-e5c9-47e7-b18d-92c9a6c4.description: Reset passwords for accounts that may have been compromised.
